title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.23 - Program for strengthening leadership resources of State educational agencies-activity B
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.23 - Program for strengthening leadership resources of State educational agencies-activity B
State Regulations

Educational information collection and reporting. (a) Specific objective. The objective is to insure that accurate and timely
information on all areas of education is available to planners and
decision-makers. This capacity helps assure that policy and program decisions
at the local, State and Federal levels are based not only on philosophy and
subjective judgment, but are also based on valid, reliable and timely data. The
ready availability of reliable data greatly increases the department's capacity
for conducting effective planning, research and evaluation. (b) Specific activities. (1)

New York State Information Center on

Education. (i) Specific objective. Develop, implement and operate educational data systems for the purpose of assembling
information in all areas of the State's educational data system. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Basic educational data system. Collect, interpret and disseminate data from public and
nonpublic elementary and secondary schools-June 1978
2. Occupational education data system. Same as number one for occupational education
3. Continuing education data system. Same as number one for public school continuing
education
4. Handicapped education. Same as number one for handicapped education
5. Public school financial data. Same as number one for public school financial
data
6. Higher education data system. Same as number one for public and nonpublic colleges
and universities
(ii)

Specific objective. Coordinate all data collection procedures within the

Education Department. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Review and clear all department data
collection. Improve data collection; reduce data
burden-Ongoing
(iii)

Specific objective. Plan, supervise and
conduct special surveys and studies. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Conduct studies and analyze results. As requested by department program units
(iv)

Specific objective. Prepare projections and estimates. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Prepare long and short range projections of public
and nonpublic school enrollments and graduates. Publication-June 1978
(2)

Educational manpower information system. (i) Specific objective. Operate the
educational manpower information system. Work tasks

Anticipated accomplishments or
products-due date
1. Automate 1977 teacher certification records. Computer based file built and merged with BEDS-June
1978
2. Produce and disseminate standard reports. Publication-June 1978
3. Produce special reports and analyses. Dissemination-Ongoing
